enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding tags to the safelist, which sets up the state for the safelist configuration.
Both methods involve adding attributes to specific tags, which sets up the state for the safelist configuration.
Both methods involve adding protocols to specific attributes, which sets up the state for the safelist configuration.
The 'basic' method sets up the safelist configuration, and 'isSafeTag' can be used to validate if a tag is allowed by the configured safelist.
The 'basic' method sets up the safelist configuration, and 'isSafeAttribute' can be used to validate if an attribute is allowed by the configured safelist.
The 'basic' method sets up the safelist configuration, and 'getEnforcedAttributes' can be used to retrieve the enforced attributes for a specific tag, which can be used for validation.
